tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had been consulting Dr. Yasmin for my wife ever since we planned for pregnancy and we are glad we took this decision. Being into High risk category her advice and medication has been extremely beneficial through out the period. Any words of appreciation will be less for the kind of advice, strength and support that she has provided us in all these months. Not only is she an expert in her area but is also very approachable, friendly and patient. She has always been available and responded to all our queries even in the wee hours. She goes an extra mile to understand the problems of her patients and provides the best solution. Our pregnancy wasnt a very smooth one but Dr. Yasmin ensured we were calmed down everytime we panicked. Even during the delivery process she was available at all times and ensured that the baby was delivered safely without causing any risk to the mother or the baby. We are blessed with a baby girl and we are thankful to Dr.Yasmin as it wouldn't have been possible without her support. We would definitely recommend her to all the future parents to be.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: this was very good experience. it was my good decision ever. She guid us and gave us good medicine and timeline checkup untill my not conceived. Now my wife is conceived and she is pregnant now. we are visiting the doctor from initial time more than 2 months. thanks Dr Yasmin Imdad mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We started visiting Yasmin Mam in 3rd trimester. I must say it was the best decision. She answers every question very calmly and also gives constant feedback if needed. She will never be in hurry. She motivated and prepared me for normal delivery. Finally with the constant support of mam and team, I had vaginal delivery. Would definitely recommend everyone to visit her during pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Labor and Delivery,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),
review:
I am writing this review to express our gratitude and heartfelt thanks to Dr. Yasmin Imdad who has guided us (throughout my wife's pregnancy) for a successful normal delivery of our baby in the month of January. We began to consult Dr. Yasmin from 7th week onwards, found her very comfortable, friendly, approachable, allocating enough time for us to discuss the progress every time. She had been advising, analyzing and treating precautionary measures based on health and BMS status week by week for progressing normal delivery as we had expressed our interest towards the same at the beginning.

Also, she has guided through all the parameters and specifically dietary habits which will keep both mother and baby health in control from the first trimester. My wife had developed gestational diabetes during the 2nd trimester which can lead to over weight of the baby and less possibility for a normal delivery. Therefore, she had advised us to workout, follow a perfect diet to control diabetes to maintain good mother and baby weight as well as to monitor blood sugar level periodically at home through which we had controlled blood sugar level.

She prescribed medicines, tests and follow-up week-by-week to monitor and develop good health for mother and baby, we just followed her foot-steps which had led to labor pain on the day when we had completed 38 weeks, and the delivery pain progressed very well. Though it was very painful for my wife, our doctor advised and strengthened us at timely to deliver our baby in a span of 3-4 hours without going for an epidural (painless method).

She treated and provided the best care when my wife had developed swelling and opening in the episiotomy area after delivery, also she asked us to do certain home treatments which really worked well and led to speedy recovery.

Throughout, our experience with Dr. Yasmin Imdad was very great, safe, comfortable and satisfying in all the scenarios as we simply have to go with her guidance and treatments. We strongly recommend Dr. Yasmin Imdad with the best experience which we have had.

Dr. Yasmin Imdad, we sincerely thank you for caring, guiding and providing best care throughout and brought us to successful normal delivery as this was our first pregnancy and you have really made us very special. Thank you doctor :-)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Yasmin doctor has been my Gynecologist since 2-3 years now. Her professionalism and connect with all her patients has been noteworthy‚Ä¶

My recent experience with her of delivering my second child after a Csec for my first one has been eventful.

VBAC was possible only because of her stern belief in me and her constant motivation. She guided me throughout my journey to have a healthy baby boy.

I have always been impressed by her simplicity & patience.

Her magical smile during all the consultations were healing and calming‚Ä¶

‚ÄúRadhika you are doing great‚Äù- will be my favorite dialogue of yours

Yasmin Doctor- you will always remain my favorite!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: On November 2019 I visited Dr. Yasmin for the first time and got assurance that I'm in a safe hand. I wanted a normal delivery and on june 2020 I delivered my baby normally under guidance of her. From beginning onwards she was very humble and supportive. **** ********* ******** *** ********** ***** ****** **** ******** I developed gestational diabetes but she made me calm for this and suggested necessary precautions and diet. She was monitoring my sugar level on phone every alternate day. During the covid situation she was always available on phone and was clearing all doubts regarding labor pain. On the time of delivery my husband was not with me as he got dengue and admitted to different hospital but just because of Dr. Yasmin I took decision to deliver on planned date of delivery by induced labor method in Rainbow hospital. She informed other doctors about my situation and Delivery went very smooth. Post delivery I got fever, she took my case very seriously and monitored everything until I got discharge. A very BIG Thanks to her, she made my pregnancy journey wonderful . I strongly recommend her for pregnancy and delivery.  üòäüòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: To start with we visited doctor Yasmin in Rainbow in  Nov 2019 in Rainbow for my wife Priyanka for pregnancy test . The very first interaction was so appealing that we were convinced that we were  in right hands and decided to stick with the doctor until delivery which eventually happened in July 2020 . Her friendliness, ability to hear out and provide right recommendations really makes her stands apart from others . We had made a request to doctor that we would like to normal delivery and she ensured that it happened despite of the fact that my wife became diabetic during pregnancy and child weight was on the higher side . Her timely diagnosis and right suggestions made the difference . The best part was her connect with the patient during the testing times because of covid situation , she remained available over phone watsapp for any queries .At last during the delivery day , she ensured that she is available for the delivery herself during mid night and kept following up with patient and duty doctors throughout her admission . I could not thank her enough for all she has done for us . I highly do recommend Yasmin Mam if you stay near ORR , marathalli or Whitefield and trust me you won't regret your decision . Thanks Anshu

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: About Dr.Yasmin in one word I can say **** ** *** ******Patience,Calmness,soothing smile are her best qualities.She will be very friendly with her patients and will listens to each and every word very carefully and provides the best solution.Our journey started with lot of confusions but after meeting Dr.Yasmin we got solutions for all our questions.She understands and analysis the situation of the patient very deeply and provides moral support when required.Finally she kept our baby safely in our hand with utmost care.Thank you so much Mamüòä.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We have started consulting Dr. Yasmin Mam after becoming Pregnant,  The path was not easy, but the professionalism, empathy and attention to us characterise you Doctor. Doctor was always supportive and made any issue look simple she always poured positive thoughts and support during anguish. She is Polite Friendly and understanding, she explained the issues in detail made us feel relaxed and answered all the queries. Immense respect to her. The best thing that makes her so special is her empathy towards her patient.
We always feel relieved consulting her at our most challenging times. 
9 months fast forward, and here we are with Our Bundle of Joy our little Boy in our hands our first Baby, All Thanks to Dr. Yasmin Mam.
I would recommend her with confidence that anyone who visits her will come out with a complete satisfaction .We would be always grateful to Dr Yasmin Mam.
Mam, Thanks for being such an Amazing Doctor.

With Lots of Love ,
Mounika & Murali.

Dr Yasmin Imdad is very friendly and helpful doctor. Initially I was apprehensive since most gyanaecologists ask intrusive questions with unsolicited suggestions. But Dr Yasmin was very sensitive. Most importantly while asking questions she asked "are you sexually active ?" instead of "are you married or unmarried? " , it is an inclusive and sensitive way of asking questions. Sexual activity of a person doesn't depend on their marital status, new age gyanaecologists should understand this. We need more doctors like Dr. Yasmin Imdad.
Today , It was my first wife's appoinment with respected  Dr Yasmin imdad. I have never seen the doctor like her. Very friendly and listen our problem politely.  Her smiling is so good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: During my pregnancy the advice  given by Dr. Yasmin always came with a rationale on why she was recommending those particular things to do, which i found quite convincing and genuine. She is always available on mobile or call so in case of any doubts you can easily contact her. Doctors way of explaining complications during pregnancy OR pros and cons of doing some tests  was very good. She addresses all your concerns during clinic visit with relevant facts and examples so that it's easy to understand.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,
review: Dr. Yasmin delivered my baby girl at Kinder hospital in July, her expertise and guidance has been crucial to me and my husband as first time parents. She has seen me right through my pregnancy from the onset and even treated me for preterm labour at 26 weeks which was quiet scary for us nonetheless with her right treatment and medication I pulled through 37 weeks and delivered a healthy baby girl. I have never seen a Dr so empathetic, calm and explains the condition correctly to the point. Dr. Yasmin has years of experience and her way of dealing with patients atleast for us is something we are most grateful for.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: ****** *** * *** **** ****** * ***** ****we started to see her after my wife stepped in to her 2nd trimester, With every visit our confidence and positivity has only gotten higher.Never rushes, always cleared all the doubts (clearly explains all the complications and provides us with an answer) by giving us enough time. Even at the off times she is just a phone call/ message away. There were time when yasmin mam her self message us to check how my wife is feeling.As my wife has a history of premature delivery, yasmin mam made sure  it is not repeated this time and took all the precautions and made sure she completed atleast 38 weeks at the time of LSCS ( cesarean section ). Couldn't have been this easier without her.we are glad and lucky that we found her.

tags: Wait time,
review:
We came to know about Dr. Yasmin Imdad from the internet. After reading the reviews we decided to visit her for consultation. It was a tough decision to make in the 5th month of pregnancy. But we never regretted our decision. She is one of the best doctors I have ever met. Apart from having expertise in her field, she is very polite, listens to and answers all the queries one may have with patience, no matter how silly the question is. She makes everything understandable in very simple words. It was only because of her patience and support that I could have a normal delivery. I was totally confident throughout my pregnancy that I was in safe hands and never had to seek any second opinion from anyone. Apart from this, she also involves the husband equally in all the discussions which is very important from a husband's perspective. In conclusion, I would blindly recommend her name to anyone seeking an OBGYN consultation in Bangalore.
P.S. - She will always reply to your texts.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Labor and Delivery,
review: Dr. Yasmin has been our doctor throughout the pregnancy. We were impressed by her friendly approach and clarity of communication as we (1st time parents!) started on the journey. And immediately thereafter the lockdowns happened - She was always there virtually, to guide us through the various stages as well as recommending the necessary supplements and tests that we should get. Her approach helped put us at ease and helped us gain confidence. When we met her in-person after many months (as lockdown eased), it was like she has always been there ! She was reassuring and took excellent care as our baby arrived at full term. Even post that, she has never been hesitant to help us whenever we have a query or confusion. She is a thorough professional with a caring heart - Thank you Dr. Yasmin !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I started my Pregnancy check up with Dr.Yasmin during my 5th month after I moved to Bengaluru. I had a cervical stitch in my 4th month. Even though I had a risk of preterm labour ma'am handled the situation very calmly. she explained to me all the details with positivity. I felt safe and comfortable with her given my condition. She was available to me over phone during this lockdown period. I delivered healthy baby on 14th May,2020 through a planned C-section. Have no second thoughts for consultanting Yasmin maam. Definitely you will have a wonderful experience. Thank you maam for all your help and guidance. It really means alot.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I met Dr Yasmin when I visited Rainbow hospital for confirming my pregnancy in October 2019. From my first meeting itself I was struck by her calm demeanor and the way she explained all the details. She did not rush us and cleared every minor doubt. I faced a few health issues during the pregnancy but she was there every step of the way. During the lockdown I could not visit the hospital a few times but I never panicked because she was always available through phone calls and messages. I delivered a healthy baby boy through a planned caesarian in June 2020. She took equal care post delivery as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would say I found very good gynecologist for my pregnency. Her expertise will make you to have trust on her easily. She will explain clearly the medical condition and the treatment in a simple manner. Though I got many complications one by one throughout my pregnancy including Gestational diabetes, had normal delivery at the end which was unexpected for me. For any problem she will suggest very precautionary steps to avoid further complications. She was continuously in touch via whatsapp. I am happy to recommend her for my beloved ones and for all without any hesitation. Thank you Dr. Yasmin Imdad

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We really had a great experience with Dr. Yashmin during my wife's whole pregnancy period. As we faced the covid situation in the 2nd trimester we got scared to visit the hospital, but she was always available in WhatsApp to clarify our issues. So the covid didn't impact us much because of doctor's friendly behaviour. Since starting we told her that we want to opt for normal delivery. So she used to take care of each and every problem which didn't lead us to c-sec and we had a healthy normal delivery on June 2nd 2020 as she promised. We are really grateful to her for staying so long in labour room when my wife was facing difficulty to push the baby. After 3 months of delivery also she has not changed and like before she is helping us now over phone. Still our parents are not here due to covid situation, but she used to guide us every single doubt whenever we have which is really appreciable. She even considered our 1st trimester USA reports in our starting days of visits to her which usually other doctors ignored and suggested us to do the testing in their hospital for clear report. Overall we had a great and wonderful journey with Dr. Yashmin and we would love to visit her again if required.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review:
Dr. Yasim is a senior most and experienced enough with lots of practical knowledge, treated well throughout the pregnancy stages with atmost care in all aspects. 
Was Successful able to identify the early pre-mature labour risk and treated in-time to delay the risk of labour as well as fasten the development of fetus and mother's health condition.
Finally blessed with baby girl. Both mother and baby healthy. Thank you so much üôè Mam for your entire service and attention on us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,
review:
I cherished my whole pregnancy journey with support of Yasmin mam, she was very supportive throughout. The way she understands our issues and guides us is commendable. Anytime we are worried about any condition she assures us that everything will be fine with her positive attitude. Not just at the hospital but she is also available anytime you need her guidance over call or watsapp.
If your in any confusion or doubt she is the go to person who provides right solution/suggestion at right time.
My whole pregnancy journey was completely safe and healthy and the credit goes to Yasmin mam.
I and my family would like to extend our gratitude to her for all the support and guidance she provided.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
We have consulted Dr Yasmin Imdad  Mam for the pre and post pregnancy. She will listen your queries very patiently and advise better medication. She is very friendly and well taken care of my wife through out the pregnancy time.
I strongly recommend to consult Yasmin Mam for any gynae related things. Thank you so much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We would highly recommend going to Dr. Yasmin for pregnancy and other gynecology issues. She has been a stellar guide and kind support in our journey to parenthood. We had multiple hurdles through the pregnancy but her expert medical counsel and steady, calm approach put us at ease. With her constant guidance we were able to successfully navigate through all the complications during pregnancy and she safely delivered our baby daughter to us ! Thank you Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),Pregnancy Scan,
review: We like to express our gratitude and thanks to Dr Yasmin for her expertise support and guidance throughout our pregnancy journey. She was very friendly approachable and patient with our queries. As a 1st time parent she explained us all the necessary precautions and care that needs to be taken and was always available on call/whatsapp for any queries. Due to some complications i had to undergo a c-section, with her in the OT i felt safe and was confident that me and my baby were in safe hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted for my wife PCOD problem initially. She treated very well and after the she got conceived. 
Very well treated during pregnancy. In 27 week her cervical length got shorten and everyone said lot of chances to get delivered in the early time but she is the only one gave hope and treated well. She extended till 39 week and had Normal delivery with healthy baby.
Great experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A highly competent doctor .Was part of my journey through out a tough twin pregnancy. Took care of all the complexity during pregnency and ultimately delivered healthy twins through a c-section. Makes the patient feel very comfortable and was always available in the lock down times through phone. Post delivery also she takes all the pains to make sure that the patient is recovering properly.I would highly recommend her as I am more than happy and highly grateful to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Right from day one of Pregnancy till delivery of my daughter Yasmeen madam was simply superb, she was very friendly approachable could ask questions without any hesitation, she took utmost care of my wife during pregnancy , wonderful personality superb doctor, thank you madam for safe delivery of my daughter god bless you and once again thanks for making us proud parents of baby girl....Shivaji and Rupa

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

We were without our family during the entire pregnancy and she ensured that our journey is awesome. I Am short of words to thank her. *** ********* ** **** **** ******* *** ********* Whosoever will consult her, I m pretty sure will have a awesome experience.

review: *** ****** ** ****** *** ******i changed 4 doctors n ended up with all my sessions with her right from 4th month of pregnancy till the end.. she explains the issue n solution for it in laymans language..she takes things positively n eases the situation..its important wen its ur first pregnancy..she has earn trust n respect for her herself n my overall pregnancy period n delivery was very smooth n fruitful bcoz of her..BIGGGGGG THANK UUUUUUUU MAAM

review: She is very friendly and explains everything in detail.I had a normal delivery under her guidance .she waits for normal delivery and keeps on telling u the advantages of it.I had a great experience with her.

*** ** *** ** *** **** *****  The way she treats you and the way she makes you understand pregnancy is amazing.

If you looking for a great pregnancy journey without any hustle do bot have a second option *** ** *** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is excellent. Our baby is delivered normal under her supervision. we are very happy with her treatment, suggestion and finally a normal delivery. She is very approachable any time on phone and whatsup also. She is very supportive and helpful in distance consultation. And most important Empathy with patient.

****** ** ***** *** the hospital charged us more with everything. Starting from the consultation charges which showed 600 in your app and we were charged 700 plus registration. **** *** ***** ******* *** ************ **** **** *******
